title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4623.2 - Standard of conduct of games prescribed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4623.2 - Standard of conduct of games prescribed

State Regulations

Every licensed authorized organization shall so
supervise, regulate and conduct games of chance, in accordance with the Games
of Chance Licensing Law and this Chapter, so as to afford and ensure all
players a fair opportunity to win and to eliminate any influence that has or
may have as its purpose the predetermination or selection of any individual
winner or winners, loser or losers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4623.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
